subject: Football
Twins
lead_paragraph: Three decades ago Steve DeOssie and Jim Jeffcoat became friends, as did their wives. Each couple had twins, one boy and one girl apiece. Now the two boys play for the N.F.L., while the girls are co-workers in Colorado.
snippet: Three decades ago Steve DeOssie and Jim Jeffcoat became friends, as did their wives. Each couple had twins, one boy and one girl apiece. Now the two boys play for the N.F.L., while the girls are co-workers in Colorado.
